title: Microsoft Power Platform
subTitle: This is a subtitle
overviewContent: I have worked extensively with Microsoft Power BI to create data-driven dashboards that provide valuable insights for business decision-making. My work includes integrating multiple data sources into Power BI, building real-time reports, and presenting key metrics in intuitive visual formats. In addition, I have used Power Automate to streamline workflows, automating repetitive tasks to increase efficiency and reduce manual workloads.
